front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Media Access Control (MAC) Bridges and Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks - Corrigendum 2: Technical and editorial corrections
front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs).
front.abstract: This corrigendum to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2011 corrects technical and editorial errors identified by the IEEE 802.1 Working Group's maintenance activity.
